name: GALAXIAN (itch) (clixmods)
description:
BASED ON THE ORIGINAL GALAXIAN (1979) BY NAMCO

GAME CREATED BY STUDENTS (1st year) FROM E ARTSUP MONTPELLIER ( FRANCE )

  • Developpers: 
    • DUCARME Aymeric, 
    • GARCIA Clément
  • Artists : 
    • VANG Victoria, 
    • HENCK Benjamin, 
    • BRACELLI Bruno

Welcome to the remaster of Galaxian
The game is a project with EARTSUP School, with the objective to remaster a game from 80's. 
Galaxian is like his original version, a Shoot Em Up Arcade.
You control a spaceship with a gun to beat yours enemies while 3 levels. 
Try to beat your high score with a new points system ! A leaderboard is available, so try your best.


Made with Unity
